query.queryString: insert into user_role_mapping (user_role_mapping_owner, user_role_mapping_owner_id, user_role_id, create_usr) values ('USER', (select user_info_id from user_info where cuid = 'dspapp' and end_date is null), (select user_role_id from user_role where user_role_name = 'Process Design'),'MDW')
insert into user_info (cuid, create_usr, name) values ('mdwapp', 'BASELINE5.5', 'MDW Application')
insert into user_info (cuid, create_usr, name) values ('dspapp', 'BASELINE5.5', 'DSP Application')

insert into user_role_mapping (user_role_mapping_owner, user_role_mapping_owner_id, user_role_id, create_usr) values ('USER_GROUP_MAP', (select user_group_mapping_id from user_group_mapping ugm, user_group ug, user_info ui where ugm.user_group_id = ug.user_group_id and ui.user_info_id = ugm.user_info_id and ui.cuid = 'mdwapp' and ui.end_date is null and ug.group_name = 'Site Admin'), (select user_role_id from user_role where user_role_name = 'User Admin'),'MDW')

insert into user_role_mapping (user_role_mapping_owner, user_role_mapping_owner_id, user_role_id, create_usr) values ('USER_GROUP_MAP', (select user_group_mapping_id from user_group_mapping ugm, user_group ug, user_info ui where ugm.user_group_id = ug.user_group_id and ui.user_info_id = ugm.user_info_id and ui.cuid = 'dspapp' and ui.end_date is null and ug.group_name = 'Site Admin'), (select user_role_id from user_role where user_role_name = 'User Admin'),'MDW')

DELETE FROM user_info WHERE (user_info_id = 1008)
select * from activity_instance where activity_instance_id=38434
update activity_instance set status_cd = 5 where activity_instance_id=38434
update activity_instance set status_cd = 4 where activity_instance_id=38434
update activity_instance set status_cd = 4 where activity_instance_id=38459
update activity_instance set status_cd = 4 where activity_instance_id=38460
select * from process_instance where master_request_id = 'tester-1462317639342'

select pi.process_instance_id, pi.master_request_id, pi.status_cd, pi.start_dt, pi.end_dt, pi.owner, pi.owner_id, pi.process_id, pi.comments as process_name, ai.activity_instance_id, ai.activity_id, ai.status_cd, ai.start_dt, ai.end_dt, ai.status_message as error, DATE_FORMAT(ai.start_dt,'%d-%M-%Y') as st FROM process_instance pi, activity_instance ai WHERE pi.process_instance_id = ai.process_instance_id AND pi.STATUS_CD NOT IN (4,5,32) AND ai.STATUS_CD IN (3,7,2,6) and ai.start_dt >= STR_TO_DATE('04-May-2016','%d-%M-%Y')
order by st desc limit 0, 50

select pi.process_instance_id, pi.master_request_id, pi.status_cd, pi.start_dt, pi.end_dt, pi.owner, pi.owner_id, pi.process_id, pi.comments as process_name, ai.activity_instance_id, ai.activity_id, ai.status_cd, ai.start_dt, ai.end_dt, ai.status_message as error, DATE_FORMAT(ai.start_dt,'%d-%M-%Y') as st FROM process_instance pi, activity_instance ai WHERE pi.process_instance_id = ai.process_instance_id AND pi.STATUS_CD NOT IN (4,5,32) AND ai.STATUS_CD IN (3,7,2,6) and ai.start_dt >= STR_TO_DATE('04-May-2016','%d-%M-%Y')

select pi.process_instance_id, pi.master_request_id, pi.status_cd, pi.start_dt, pi.end_dt, pi.owner, pi.owner_id, pi.process_id, pi.comments as process_name, ai.activity_instance_id, ai.activity_id, ai.status_cd, ai.start_dt, ai.end_dt, ai.status_message as error, DATE_FORMAT(ai.start_dt,'%d-%M-%Y') as st FROM process_instance pi, activity_instance ai WHERE pi.process_instance_id = ai.process_instance_id AND pi.STATUS_CD NOT IN (4,5,32) AND ai.STATUS_CD IN (3,7,2,6) and ai.start_dt >= STR_TO_DATE('04-May-2016','%d-%M-%Y') order by st desc

select pi.process_instance_id, pi.master_request_id, pi.status_cd, pi.start_dt, pi.end_dt, pi.owner, pi.owner_id, pi.process_id, pi.comments as process_name, ai.activity_instance_id, ai.activity_id, ai.status_cd, ai.start_dt, ai.end_dt, ai.status_message as error, DATE_FORMAT(ai.start_dt,'%d-%M-%Y') as st FROM process_instance pi, activity_instance ai WHERE pi.process_instance_id = ai.process_instance_id AND pi.STATUS_CD NOT IN (4,5,32) AND ai.STATUS_CD IN (3,7,2,6) and ai.start_dt >= STR_TO_DATE('06-June-2016','%d-%M-%Y') order by st desc

select pi.process_instance_id, pi.master_request_id, pi.status_cd, pi.start_dt, pi.end_dt, pi.owner, pi.owner_id, pi.process_id, pi.comments as process_name, ai.activity_instance_id, ai.activity_id, ai.status_cd, ai.start_dt, ai.end_dt, ai.status_message as error, ai.start_dt as st FROM process_instance pi, activity_instance ai WHERE pi.process_instance_id = ai.process_instance_id AND pi.STATUS_CD NOT IN (4,5,32) AND ai.STATUS_CD IN (3,7,2,6) and ai.start_dt >= STR_TO_DATE('06-June-2016','%d-%M-%Y') order by st desc
